attributes.action: We want a call for a General Election to be held now.
attributes.additional_details:
All this has caused a bigger divide in the country and the public feel that their voice and votes are not being represented or respected by a majority of MP's who seem more keen on self interest than of their constituents.
Not respecting the referendum result.
Tying us down with Brexit in Parliament whilst other important national matters take second place.
Not respecting Party Manifestos or constituents Party Votes.
attributes.background: It is clear the authority of the House of Parliament is in disarray. We call on Parliament and the PM to call for a General Election now.
